name: Vortexify AI
long_description:
Vortexify AI is a platform to build fully enabled AI workflows for supply chain operations. Deploy specialized, task specific AI bots in days instead of weeks. Our platform simplifies the process to build AI agents that interact with millions of rows of data, and can perform long horizon, complex tasks that require a human in the loop.

AI bots are equipped with custom tools that are maintained by AI code editors directly in the Vortexify platform. Dev teams can generate dashboards, functions, machine learning models or data pipelines in seconds based on the data needed for the task and provided business context.

Each AI bot can be run in co-pilot or agent mode. Agents can be triggered based on real time alerts or scheduled and have gaurdrails through templates generated through natural language.
one_liner: AI agents for supply chain operations
